name: Eldar Cafe
text:
APPETIZERS
Chips & Cheese $16.49
Chips, corn, bell pepper, black olives, green olives, ketchup, thousand island sauce
French Fries $10.20
Fried potatoes with Parmesan cheese
Lentils $12.50
Lentil, fried onion, olive oil, lemon juice with bread
Mozzarella Sticks $10.99
Golden fried mozzarella cheese sticks
Summer Fruit Bowl $14.80
Strawberry, raspberry, blackberry, blueberry, mango, kiwi
Mexican Corn $8.99
Corn, mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, oregano, mushroom, butter
FOOD & SANDWICH
Pasta Alfredo $20.99
Fettuccine pasta, chicken, mushroom, cream, milk
Lasagna $21.60
Lasagna pasta, ground beef, mushroom, tomato paste, mozzarella cheese
Kashke Bademjan $25.00
Eggplant, kashk, fried garlic, fried mint, fried onion, walnut — served with three pieces of Persian bread
Mirza Ghasemi $22.40
Eggplant, tomato, egg, garlic — served with three pieces of Persian bread
Sosis Bandari $19.50
Sausage, tomato paste, onion — served with three pieces of Persian bread
Sambooseh $8.99
Potato with green onion, parsley, onion, seasoned with pepper, deep-fried and served with ketchup
Pirashki $9.20
Ground beef, onion, bell pepper, mozzarella cheese, mushroom
Tuna Sandwich $15.20
Tuna, mayonnaise, celery, carrot, toast
Turkey Sandwich $17.90
Smoky turkey, lettuce, tomato, pickles, sauce
Chicken Breast Sandwich $20.99
Smoky chicken, lettuce, tomato, pickles, sauce
CREPE & WAFFLE
Strawberry Crepe $14.99
Banana Crepe $12.99
Strawberry Waffle $14.99
Banana Waffle $13.99
COLD DRINKS
Iced Coffee $3.99 | $4.75 | $5.25
Iced Americano $3.99 | $4.55 | $5.20
Iced Latte $4.75 | $5.45 | $5.99
Iced Caramel Macchiato $5.75 | $6.10 | $6.45
Iced Mocha $5.25 | $5.99 | $6.50
Iced Matcha Latte $5.25 | $5.99 | $6.50
Caramel Mocha $7.20 | $7.80 | $8.10
Iced Chai Tea Latte $4.20 | $4.75 | $5.50
Shiraz Spark $6.99
Coce Espresso $7.50
TOASTS & BAGEL
Sunrise Toast $16.50
Toast, sliced tomato, mashed avocado, egg, black olives, lemon
Rainbows Toast $17.20
Scrambled eggs with mushroom, sliced avocado, cherry tomato, and cheese, black olives, cherry tomatoes, lemon
Golden Morning Toast $16.99
Toast with mozzarella, bacon, and egg, served with pickles and black olives
Eldar Breakfast $21.99
Sausage, toast, egg, mushroom, cherry tomato, bacon, potato wedges, red beans
Everything Bagel $14.99
Everything bagel with bacon, sliced cheddar cheese, and scrambled egg — served with sliced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, and olive oil
Cheese Bagel $13.99
Sesame bagel with cream cheese, cucumber, tomato, spinach — served with parmesan cheese, walnut, butter, honey, cherry tomatoes, and spinach
Family Bagel $42.50
Sesame bagel, plain bagel, bacon, cucumber, cherry tomato, black olives, avocado, spinach, lemon, peanut butter, honey, cream cheese, mint, and green olives
SALADS
Mix Green Salad $13.99
$15.99
Spinach, strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, walnut, balsamic sauce, Parmesan cheese
Beans Salad $14.99
$16.99
Lettuce, corn, cherry tomato, black beans, chickpeas, avocado, poppy seed dressing
Caesar Salad $17.50
$22.50
Lettuce, grilled chicken, black olives, almonds, toasted croutons, sunflower seeds, Caesar dressing
DESSERTS
Baklava $3.00 Each | $25 LB
Napoleon $6.25 Each | $25 LB
Eclair $4.25 Large | $3.25 Small $20 LB
Roulette $6.25 Each | $23 LB
Chocolate Chip Puff $5.20
Strawberry Croissant $6.90
Jelly Cake $3.99
BEVERAGES
Coca Cola Zero Sugar $3.35
Diet Coca Cola $3.35
Coca Cola $3.35
Pepsi $3.45
Canada Dry $3.35
Sprite $3.45
Fanta Pineapple $3.45
Fanta $3.45
Gatorade Sport Drink $4.19
Rani $3.45
Abali Yogurt Drink $5.50
Water $2.80
PERSIAN BREAKFAST (OMELETTES)
Classic Eggs $16.70
Two classic eggs — served with butter, honey, cheese, walnut, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, fresh herbs, and olive oil, accompanied by three pieces of Persian bread
Tomato Omelette $18.20
Eggs with fresh crushed tomato — served with butter, honey, cheese, walnut, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, fresh herbs, and olive oil, accompanied by three pieces of Persian bread
Sausage & Egg $19.99
Salami sausage with egg — served with butter, honey, cheese, walnut, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, fresh herbs, and olive oil, accompanied by three pieces of Persian bread
Date Omelette $18.20
Fresh dates with two eggs — served with butter, honey, cheese, walnut, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, fresh herbs, and olive oil, accompanied by three pieces of Persian bread
Nargesi Omelette $19.99
Fried spinach, fried onion, and scrambled eggs — served with butter, honey, cheese, walnut, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, fresh herbs, and olive oil, accompanied by three pieces of Persian bread
Cheese Platter $15.60
Cucumber, tomato, olives, cheese, walnut, butter, honey — served with Persian bread
MILKSHAKE
Nuttela Milkshake $14.99
Date Milkshake $12.99
Strawberry Milkshake $12.99
Chocolate Milkshake $12.99
Mango Milkshake $14.99
Majoon (Persian Energy Shake) $16.99
